root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].new_value: Enables one designated ally character and their summon to immediately take action, and increases their DMG dealt by [15|30]%. If the target has a summon, then the dealt DMG increase is further boosted by an additional [25|50]%, lasting for 2 turn(s). After using Skill on The Beatified, recovers 1 Skill Point. When Sunday uses this ability on characters following the Path of Harmony, cannot trigger the 'immediate action' effect.
root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].old_value: Causes one designated ally character and their summon to immediately take action, and increases their DMG dealt by [20|40]%. If the target has a summon, then DMG additionally increases by [20|40]%, lasting for 2 turn(s). When Sunday uses this ability on characters following the Path of Harmony, the 'immediate action' effect cannot be triggered.

root['Kit']['Ultimate']['Desc'].new_value: Regenerates Energy by 20% of Max Energy for one designated ally character, and turns the target and their summon into 'The Beatified.' 'The Beatified' have their CRIT DMG increased by an amount equal to [12|30]% of Sunday's CRIT DMG plus [8|12]%. At the start of Sunday's each turn, the duration of 'The Beatified' decreases by 1 turn, lasting for a total of 3 turn(s). And it only takes effect on the most recent target of the Ultimate (excluding Sunday himself). When Sunday is knocked down, 'The Beatified' will also be dispelled.
root['Kit']['Ultimate']['Desc'].old_value: Regenerates Energy by 20% of Max Energy for one designated ally character and turns the target and their summon into 'The Beatified.' 'The Beatified' have their CRIT DMG increased by an amount equal to [10|25]% of Sunday's CRIT DMG plus [6.4|8]%. At the start of Sunday's each turn, reduces the duration of 'The Beatified' by 1 turn, lasting for a total of 3 turn(s). And it only takes effect on the most recent target of the Ultimate (excluding Sunday himself). When Sunday becomes downed, 'The Beatified' will also be dispelled.

root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].new_value: When using Skill, increases the target's CRIT Rate by [10|20]%, lasting for 3 turn(s).
root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].old_value: When using Skill, increases the target's CRIT Rate by [10|20]%. This effect lasts for 2 turn(s).

root['Kit']['Technique']['Desc'].new_value: After this Technique is used, the first time Sunday uses an ability on an ally target in the next battle, the target's DMG dealt increases by 50%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
root['Kit']['Technique']['Desc'].old_value: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, increases all ally targets' DMG by 50%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

root['Traces']['Branch 1']['Desc'].new_value: When using Ultimate, if the Energy regenerated for the target is less than 40, increases the regenerated Energy to 40.
root['Traces']['Branch 1']['Desc'].old_value: Using Skill will not consume Skill Points. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turn(s).

root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].new_value: When Sunday uses Skill, the target character can ignore 16% of enemy target's DEF to deal DMG and their summon can ignore 40% of enemy target's DEF to deal DMG, lasting for 2 turn(s).
root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].old_value: When Sunday uses Skill, increases the target's All-Type RES PEN by 20%, lasting for 1 turn(s). And this effect will last until the start of the target's next turn.

root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].new_value: After the first use of Ultimate, recovers 2 Skill Point(s). The DMG dealt by 'The Beatified' increases by 30%.
root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].old_value: While 'The Beatified' exists on the field, increases the SPD of Sunday and 'The Beatified' by 20.

root['Eidolons']['4']['Desc'].new_value: When the turn starts, regenerates 8 Energy.
root['Eidolons']['4']['Desc'].old_value: At the start of the turn, regenerates 8 Energy.

root['Eidolons']['6']['Desc'].new_value: The Talent's CRIT Rate boost effect becomes stackable up to 3 time(s), and the Talent's duration increases by 1 turn(s). When Sunday uses Ultimate, can also apply the Talent's CRIT Rate boost effect to the target. When the Talent's CRIT Rate boost takes effect and the target's CRIT Rate exceeds 100%, every 1% of excess CRIT Rate increases CRIT DMG by 2%.
root['Eidolons']['6']['Desc'].old_value: The Talent's CRIT Rate boost effect becomes stackable up to 3 time(s). When Sunday uses Ultimate, he also applies the Talent's CRIT Rate boost effect to the target. When the Talent's CRIT Rate boost takes effect and the target's CRIT Rate exceeds 100%, every 1% of excess CRIT Rate is converted to 2% CRIT DMG.
